review: My Gynaecologist is an excellent doctor. The doctor has a very good bedside manner *** ********* ********The doctor is also very patient, compassionate and understanding.The doctor is friendly and takes her time listen to patients. I value her professional opinion and feel at ease after visiting.

Her meds worked from the first dose onwards

However, she was constantly on a call and rushed. Did not give me enough time to process information and ask her questions. Disappointed to see how doctors these days are losing the human touch. As an old saying goes - half the problems disappear when a doctor sits a patient with patience. 

She is an accomplished lady - I only wish it makes you more humble to priorities patients' queries over phone calls except emergencies.

Just when I lost all hope of becoming a parent, got to know about International Fertility Centre and Dr. Rita Bakshi made it possible. And now I am a mother of a beautiful baby boy. All thanks to the Staff of IFC and my special thanks to Dr. Rita Bakshi.

We don't have the words to say how we feel about having our baby with out Dr Rita and the teams involvement we don't think would have been parents today with out the Dr Rita help she has been very supportive and caring towards us through out our treatment
Doctor was not saying anything much. She was asking me instead, I was expecting some expert opinion given her experience in the field.

We are highly grateful to International Fertility Centre, for the expert superior second advice, at our inability to get a child & giving us a perfect solution, a baby we hoped for so long, the sparkle of our eyes, ever-since, the little steps entered our family.

review: Dr. Rita is very ************* * experienced. She lend her ears right from beginning, paid complete attention to each details, evaluated and treated with utmost care. I discussed each and every detail with doctors in a friendly way. My embryo transfer was done recently and I am hopeful that my pregnancy test will emerge as positive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife and I visited Dr Bakshi in September/October of 2017. Before visiting Dr Bakshi my wife had undergone four unsuccessful IUI treatments. My wife was 37 years and we knew time was not in our favour. Dr Bakshi has a very calming presence and she immediately put us at ease. She recommended we go for an IVF. The process started in November 2017. We consulted her once every month during the pregnancy period.  Despite being a very busy doctor, Dr Bakshi never hurries through her appointments. Many a time I felt bad for taking too much of her time. My wife delivered healthy twins in August 2018.

So, first of all i chose her ONLY by seeing 33 years of experience and then when i go there, i don't even get to see the doctor. 
Secondly when i reached, they were unaware of the concept of payment through practo and asked me to pay there and then after making few calls, they understood that payment could ALSO be done through practo. 
Then i was asked to explain my problem to a junior doctor, who after listening prescribed me the medicines without physically checking me. So, all in all, i did not get what i paid for. I had no problem with the junior doctor, she was very friendly, but i should have paid less if i was consulting a junior doctor.
****** * ****** *** ** **** *** *** * *** ******** ***** *****

We think the experience of Dr Rita is very good *** *** ** *** **** ** *** ***** as we tried many other doctors also but they don't treat there patient as priority.

So say thanks to Dr Rita and her team to give our life a new way to live.

Thanks again and we don't have the word to thank Dr Rita and her team.


Regards

Kanchan Agarwal.

I find her very sharp and quick to find the problem. She is very clear. She will not write unnecessary medicine which will harm you. She will try to give you less and best medicine. ***** ******* multiple people have recommend her to me and I got to her too.

Very good experience with DR. Rita Bakshi. She just solve our problem in few second. In future if I again face any gyne problem I must visit her and recommend her to my friends family member etc. Thank you so much Dr. Rita. Really had a great experience with her.

It was very good experienc e with the doctors as well as the staffs here.The ambience of the clynic is also very good.Doctors are very soft spoken here and they having the good knowledge of the treatment.I have big hope that for what purpose I had visited here it will fulfilled.

She was good and explained why it required to be removed but she didn't follow up after my surgery. After the surgery, it was another doctor called dr. Yukti who assisted to the queries. Overall it was okay.
